scripts.start: yarn network:start & sleep 5 && yarn config:init && yarn contract:deploy && yarn client:init && yarn client:start && fg
scripts.contract:deploy: node compile.js && node deploy.js && yarn run client:init
scripts.client:init: cp target/PORT client/config && cp target/DeployedContractAddress.bin client/config && echo 'const abi = (' > ./client/config/FirmwareUdpdatesAbi.ts && cat ./target/FirmwareUdpdatesAbi.json >> ./client/config/FirmwareUdpdatesAbi.ts && echo ') as const; export default abi;' >> ./client/config/FirmwareUdpdatesAbi.ts
